00092 template<int V>
00093 void MotionMatrix<V>::svd_solve(const MeasurementMatrix<V> &measurement) {
00094 
00095   ShapeMatrix           shape;
00096   StrumTriggsSolver<V>  stSolver(*this, shape);
00097 
00098   stSolver.solve(measurement);
00099 
00100   /******
00101   MeasurementMatrix<V>  scaledMeasurement(measurement);
00102   ImageTransform<V>     denormalisation;
00103   ShapeMatrix           shape;
00104 
00105   scaledMeasurement.normalise(denormalisation);
00106   scaledMeasurement.approx_scale();
00107   scaledMeasurement.factorise_with_occlusions(*this, shape);
00108   scaledMeasurement.scale_and_fill(*this, shape);
00109 
00110   std::cout << "Filled measurement = " << std::endl;
00111   std::cout << scaledMeasurement << std::endl;
00112 
00113   scaledMeasurement.svd_factorise(*this, shape);
00114   denormalisation.apply_to(*this);
00115   *****/
00116 }

00123 template<int V>
00124 double MotionMatrix<V>::bundle_adjust(int f, const MeasurementMatrix<V> &measurement) {
00125   int                   info;
00126   Eigen::VectorXd       err;
00127   MeasurementMatrix<V>  scaledMeasurement(measurement);
00128   ImageTransform<V>     denormalisation;
00129   BundleAdjuster<V>     ba_solver(scaledMeasurement, *this);
00130 
00131   scaledMeasurement.normalise(denormalisation);
00132   ba_solver.levmar_solve(f);
00133   denormalisation.apply_to(*this);
00134 
00135   reprojection_err(measurement, err);
00136   return(err.norm());
00137 }

00163 template<int V>
00164 template<int F>
00165 Eigen::Matrix4d MotionMatrix<V>::diac_euclidean_lift(int nCameras, const ImageTransform<F> &fixedIntrinsics) {
00166   int                   i,j,k;
00167   Eigen::Matrix4d       H;
00168   Eigen::Matrix3d       diac;
00169 
00170   // H = [A|B]
00171 
00172   // --- first compute B, assuming origin
00173   // --- is at the first view so if P_0 = [R|r]
00174   // --- and B = [b|1] then Rb = -r
00175   // ------------------------------
00176   Eigen::Matrix3d       R;
00177   Eigen::Vector3d       r;
00178  
00179   R = view(0).leftCols(3);
00180   r = view(0).col(3);
00181   H.col(3).topRows(3) = -R.inverse()*r;
00182   H(3,3) = 1.0;
00183 
00184   // --- now do linear least squares on constraints:
00185   // ---        [ a_i  0   0   ]
00186   // --- w_i =  [ 0   a_i  0   ] = PQP^T
00187   // ---        [ 0    0   s_i ]
00188   // --- and s_1 = 1.0;
00189   Eigen::Matrix<double, Eigen::Dynamic, 10> coeffs; // coefficients of Q
00190   Eigen::Matrix<double, Eigen::Dynamic, 1>  y;  // vals of fit coeffs*x=y
00191   Eigen::Matrix<double, 10, 1>          x;      // result of least square fit
00192   Eigen::Matrix4d                       Q;      // result repacked as matrix
00193 
00194   // --- construct matrix of coefficients of elements of Q
00195   if(nCameras < F) nCameras = F;
00196   coeffs.resize(4*F + 3*(nCameras-F) + V + 1,10);
00197   y.resize(4*F + 3*(nCameras-F) + V + 1);
00198   y.fill(0.0);
00199   i = 0;
00200   j = 0;
00201 
00202   for(j = 0; j < V; ++j) {
00203     if(j<F) {
00204       // --- constrains for known intrinsics:
00205       // --- i   -> w_00 - (fx^2 + px^2)w_22 = 0
00206       // --- i+1 -> w_01 - (pxpy)w_22 = 0
00207       // --- i+2 -> w_02 - (px)w_22 = 0
00208       // --- i+3 -> w_11 - (fy^2 + py^2)w_22 = 0
00209       // --- i+4 -> w_12 - (py)w_22 = 0
00210       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(2), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i+5));
00211       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(0), coeffs.row(i));
00212       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(1), coeffs.row(i+1));
00213       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i+2));
00214       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(1), view(j).row(1), coeffs.row(i+3));
00215       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(1), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i+4));
00216       diac = fixedIntrinsics.view(j) * fixedIntrinsics.view(j).transpose();
00217       diac /= diac(2,2);
00218       coeffs.row(i)   -= diac(0,0) * coeffs.row(i+5);
00219       coeffs.row(i+1) -= diac(0,1) * coeffs.row(i+5);
00220       coeffs.row(i+2) -= diac(0,2) * coeffs.row(i+5);
00221       coeffs.row(i+3) -= diac(1,1) * coeffs.row(i+5);
00222       coeffs.row(i+4) -= diac(1,2) * coeffs.row(i+5);
00223       i += 5;
00224     } else {
00225       // --- constrain for aspect skew + pxpy = 0 
00226       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(1), coeffs.row(i));
00227       ++i;
00228       if(j<nCameras) {
00229         // --- constraints for cameras:
00230         // --- i    -> x-principal point = 0
00231         // --- i+1  -> y-principal point = 0
00232         // --- i+2  -> aspect ratio = 1
00233         quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i));
00234         quadratic_prod(view(j).row(1), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i+1));
00235         quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(0), coeffs.row(i+2));
00236         quadratic_prod(view(j).row(1), view(j).row(1), coeffs.row(i+3)); // tmp
00237         coeffs.row(i+2) -= coeffs.row(i+3);
00238         i += 3;
00239       }
00240     }
00241   }
00242   // --- constraint on scale
00243   quadratic_prod(view(0).row(2), view(0).row(2), coeffs.row(i));
00244   y(i) = 1.0;
00245 
00246   // --- solve least squares and reform Q
00247 
00248   x = coeffs.jacobiSvd(Eigen::ComputeFullU | Eigen::ComputeFullV).solve(y);
00249 
00250   std::cout << "coeffs*x = " << std::endl;
00251   std::cout << coeffs*x << std::endl;
00252 
00253   k = 0;
00254   for(i = 0; i<4; ++i) {
00255     for(j = i; j<4; ++j){ 
00256       Q(i,j) = Q(j,i) = x(k++);
00257     }
00258     Q(i,i) *= 2.0;
00259   }
00260 
00261   // --- re-weight the coefficients and solve again
00262   int weight;
00263   i = 0;
00264   for(j=1; j<V; ++j) {
00265     weight = 1.0/(view(j) * Q * view(j).transpose())(2,2);
00266     if(j<F) {
00267       coeffs.middleRows<5>(i) *= weight;
00268       i += 5;
00269     }
00270     else {
00271       coeffs.row(i) *= weight;
00272       ++i;
00273       if(j<nCameras) {
00274         coeffs.middleRows<3>(i) *= weight;
00275         i += 3;
00276       }
00277     }
00278   }
00279 
00280   x = coeffs.jacobiSvd(Eigen::ComputeFullU | Eigen::ComputeFullV).solve(y);
00281 
00282   std::cout << "coeffs*x = " << std::endl;
00283   std::cout << coeffs*x << std::endl;
00284 
00285   k = 0;
00286   for(i = 0; i<4; ++i) {
00287     for(j = i; j<4; ++j){ 
00288       Q(i,j) = Q(j,i) = x(k++);
00289     }
00290     Q(i,i) *= 2.0;
00291   }
00292 
00293   // --- extract A from Q
00294   // --------------------
00295   Eigen::JacobiSVD<Eigen::Matrix4d> svdQ(Q, Eigen::ComputeFullU);
00296   H.leftCols(3) = svdQ.matrixU().leftCols(3) * 
00297     svdQ.singularValues().topRows(3).cwiseSqrt().asDiagonal();
00298 
00299   // --- set reference rotation
00300   // --- so that P_0 has zero
00301   // --- rotation: MM^T = [M|t]Q[M|t]^T = KK^T
00302   // --- PH = K[R|0] so K^-1PH = [R|0]
00303   // --- so PH[R^-1|0] = K[I|0]
00304   // ---      [ 0  |1]
00305   // -----------------------------------------
00306   Eigen::Matrix3d       K1;   // inverse intrinsics of view 0
00307   Eigen::Matrix4d       Rot; // rotation
00308   Eigen::Matrix3d       MMT; // MM^T where P=[M|t]
00309 
00310   MMT = view(0)*Q*view(0).transpose();
00311   K1 = MMT.inverse().llt().matrixU();
00312 
00313   Rot.fill(0.0);
00314   Rot.topLeftCorner(3,3) = (K1*(view(0)*H).leftCols(3)).inverse();
00315   Rot(3,3) = 1.0;
00316 
00317   H *= Rot;
00318   
00319   return(H);
00320 }
00321 
00322 template<int V>
00323 Eigen::Matrix4d MotionMatrix<V>::diac_euclidean_lift(int nCameras) {
00324   ImageTransform<0> dummy;
00325   return(diac_euclidean_lift(nCameras, dummy));
00326 }

00332 template<int V>
00333 Eigen::Vector3d MotionMatrix<V>::plane_at_infinity(int nCameras) {
00334   int                           i,j,k;
00335   Eigen::Matrix<double,4,3>     A;
00336   Eigen::Vector3d               p; // Plane at infinity
00337 
00338   // --- now do linear least squares on constraints:
00339   // ---        [ a_i  0   0   ]
00340   // --- w_i =  [ 0   a_i  0   ] = PQP^T
00341   // ---        [ 0    0   s_i ]
00342   // --- and s_1 = 1.0;
00343   Eigen::Matrix<double, Eigen::Dynamic, 10> coeffs; // coefficients of Q
00344   Eigen::Matrix<double, Eigen::Dynamic, 1>  y;  // vals of fit coeffs*x=y
00345   Eigen::Matrix<double, 10, 1>          x;      // result of least square fit
00346   Eigen::Matrix4d                       Q;      // result repacked as matrix
00347 
00348   // --- construct matrix of coefficients of elements of Q
00349   coeffs.resize(3*nCameras + V + 1,10);
00350   y.resize(3*nCameras + V + 1);
00351   y.fill(0.0);
00352   i = 0;
00353   j = 0;
00354   for(j = 0; j< nCameras; ++j) {
00355     // --- equations enforcing zero principal point
00356     // --- i+1  -> x-principal point = 0
00357     // --- i+2  -> y-principal point = 0
00358     quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i));
00359     quadratic_prod(view(j).row(1), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i+1));
00360     quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(0), coeffs.row(i+2));
00361     quadratic_prod(view(j).row(1), view(j).row(1), coeffs.row(i+3)); // tmp
00362     coeffs.row(i+2) -= coeffs.row(i+3);
00363     i += 3;
00364 
00365   }
00366   for(j = 0; j<V; ++j) {
00367     // --- equation enforcing aspect skew + pxpy = 0 
00368     quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(1), coeffs.row(i));
00369     ++i;
00370   }
00371   // --- equation to set scale
00372   quadratic_prod(view(0).row(2), view(0).row(2), coeffs.row(i));
00373   y(i) = 1.0;
00374 
00375   // --- solve least squares and reform Q
00376 
00377   x = coeffs.jacobiSvd(Eigen::ComputeFullU | Eigen::ComputeFullV).solve(y);
00378 
00379   std::cout << "coeffs*x = " << std::endl;
00380   std::cout << coeffs*x << std::endl;
00381 
00382   k = 0;
00383   for(i = 0; i<4; ++i) {
00384     for(j = i; j<4; ++j){ 
00385       Q(i,j) = Q(j,i) = x(k++);
00386     }
00387     Q(i,i) *= 2.0;
00388   }
00389 
00390   // --- extract A from Q
00391   // --------------------
00392   Eigen::JacobiSVD<Eigen::Matrix4d> svdQ(Q, Eigen::ComputeFullU);
00393   A = svdQ.matrixU().leftCols(3) * 
00394     svdQ.singularValues().topRows(3).cwiseSqrt().asDiagonal();
00395   p.transpose() = -A.row(3) * A.topRows(3).inverse();
00396   
00397   return(p);
00398 }

00400 
00405 template<int V>
00406 Eigen::Matrix4d MotionMatrix<V>::euclidean_lift(const Eigen::Vector3d &p) {
00407   int                                   i,j,k;
00408   Eigen::Matrix<double, 2*V + 1, 6>     coeffs;
00409   Eigen::Matrix<double, 2*V + 1, 1>     y;
00410   Eigen::Matrix<double, 6, 1>           x;
00411   Eigen::Matrix3d                       HT;  // inverse transpose of the 
00412                                              // infinite homography
00413   Eigen::Matrix3d                       iac; // image of the absolute conic
00414   Eigen::Matrix3d                       K;   // camera intrinsics
00415   Eigen::Matrix4d                       H;   // transform 
00416 
00417   y.fill(0.0);
00418   i = 0;
00419   for(j = 0; j<V; ++j) {
00420     // --- If P = [A|a], H^-T = (A - ap^T)^-T
00421     // --------------------------------------
00422     HT.transpose() = (view(j).leftCols(3) - 
00423                       view(j).col(3)*p.transpose()).inverse();
00424     if(j == 0) {
00425       // --- equation to set scale
00426       quadratic_prod(HT.row(0), HT.row(2), coeffs.row(i)); // zero skew
00427       quadratic_prod(HT.row(1), HT.row(2), coeffs.row(i+1)); // aspect ratio=1
00428       quadratic_prod(HT.row(2), HT.row(2), coeffs.row(i+2)); // aspect ratio=1
00429       coeffs.row(i) += coeffs.row(i+1);
00430       coeffs.row(i) += coeffs.row(i+2);
00431       y(i) = 1.0;
00432       ++i;
00433     }
00434     quadratic_prod(HT.row(0), HT.row(0), coeffs.row(i)); // aspect ratio=1
00435     quadratic_prod(HT.row(1), HT.row(1), coeffs.row(i+1));
00436     coeffs.row(i) -= coeffs.row(i+1);
00437     quadratic_prod(HT.row(0), HT.row(2), coeffs.row(i+1)); // zero skew
00438     i += 2;
00439   }
00440 
00441   x = coeffs.jacobiSvd(Eigen::ComputeFullU | Eigen::ComputeFullV).solve(y);
00442 
00443   std::cout << "coeffs*x = " << std::endl;
00444   std::cout << coeffs*x << std::endl;
00445 
00446   k = 0;
00447   for(i = 0; i<3; ++i) {
00448     for(j = i; j<3; ++j){ 
00449       iac(i,j) = iac(j,i) = x(k++);
00450     }
00451     iac(i,i) *= 2.0;
00452   }
00453 
00454   K = iac.llt().matrixU();
00455   H.topLeftCorner(3,3) = K.inverse();
00456   H.leftCols(3).row(3) = -p.transpose()*H.topLeftCorner(3,3);
00457 
00458   // --- set origin at view 0
00459   H.col(3).topRows(3) = -view(0).leftCols(3).inverse()*view(0).col(3);
00460   H(3,3) = 1.0;
00461 
00462   return(H);
00463 }
00464 
00477 template<int VIEWS>
00478 double MotionMatrix<VIEWS>::KR_decompose(int i, Eigen::Affine2d &K,
00479                                                 Eigen::AngleAxisd &R) const {
00480   Eigen::Matrix3d       MMT;            // M*M^T
00481   Eigen::Matrix3d       RMat;           // Rotation in matrix form
00482   double                scale;          // scaling factor
00483   Eigen::Affine2d       K1;             // inverse intrinsics
00484 
00485   // --- Do Cholesky decomposition of
00486   // --- (MM^T)^-1 = K^-TR^-TR^-1K^-1
00487   // ---           = K^-TK^-1 = LL^T
00488   // --- then    R = K^-1M
00489   // --------------------------------
00490   MMT   = M(i) * M(i).transpose();
00491   K1.matrix()  = MMT.inverse().llt().matrixU();
00492   RMat  = K1.matrix() * M(i);
00493   scale = 1.0/K1(2,2);
00494   K1.matrix() *= scale;
00495   K     = K1.inverse();
00496 
00497   /************
00498   // --- Do QR decomposition where
00499   // --- if X.fliprows^T = QR then
00500   // --- X = R^T.fliprows.flipcols Q^T.fliprows
00501   // ------------------------------------------
00502   K.matrix().triangularView<Eigen::Upper>() = 
00503     M(i).colwise().reverse().transpose().
00504     householderQr().matrixQR().
00505     transpose().colwise().reverse().rowwise().reverse();
00506   K(1,0) = 0.0;
00507   // --- ensure +ve focal lengths
00508   int j;
00509   for(j = 0; j<3; ++j) {
00510     if(K(j,j) < 0.0) {
00511       K.matrix().col(j) *= -1.0;
00512     }
00513   }
00514   scale = K(2,2);
00515   K.matrix() /= scale;
00516   RMat = (K.inverse() * M(i))/scale;
00517   **********/
00518 
00519   // --- remove reflections and
00520   // --- extract rotation angles
00521   if(RMat.determinant() < 0.0) {
00522     RMat *= -1.0;
00523     scale *= -1.0;
00524   }
00525   R = RMat;
00526 
00527   return(scale);
00528 }
00529 
00530 
00544 template<int VIEWS>
00545 double MotionMatrix<VIEWS>::KR_decompose(ImageTransform<VIEWS> &K,
00546                                          ImageTransform<VIEWS> &R) const {
00547   int                   i;
00548   Eigen::Affine2d       Kn;
00549   Eigen::AngleAxisd     Rn;
00550 
00551   for(i = 0; i<VIEWS; ++i) {
00552     KR_decompose(i,Kn,Rn);
00553     K.view(i) = Kn.matrix();
00554     R.view(i) = Rn.toRotationMatrix();
00555   }
00556   return(0.0);
00557 }
00558 
00559 
00563 template<int V>
00564 void MotionMatrix<V>::reprojection_err(
00565                                        const MeasurementMatrix<V> &E,
00566                                        Eigen::VectorXd &err) {
00567   int                           i,j,n;
00568   Eigen::Matrix<double, 3*V, 1> reproj;
00569   ShapeMatrix                   shape;
00570 
00571   if(err.size() == 0)  err.resize(2*V*E.cols());
00572   shape.solve(E, *this);
00573   n = 0;
00574   for(j=0; j<E.cols(); ++j) {
00575     reproj = *this * shape.col(j);
00576     for(i = 0; i<V; ++i) {
00577       if(!E.pixel_is_occluded(i,j)) {
00578         err(n++) = reproj(3*i)  /reproj(3*i+2)-E.pixel(i,j)(0)/E.pixel(i,j)(2);
00579         err(n++) = reproj(3*i+1)/reproj(3*i+2)-E.pixel(i,j)(1)/E.pixel(i,j)(2);
00580       }
00581     }
00582   }
00583   while(n < err.size()) {
00584     err(n++) = 0.0;
00585   }
00586 }

00591 template<int V>
00592 template<class D>
00593 MotionMatrix<V> &MotionMatrix<V>::operator=(const Eigen::MatrixBase<D> &o) {
00594   Base::operator=(o);
00595   return(*this);
00596 }

00602 template<int V>
00603 void MotionMatrix<V>::quadratic_prod(const Eigen::Vector4d &v,
00604                                      const Eigen::Vector4d &w,
00605                                      typename Eigen::Matrix<double,Eigen::Dynamic,10>::RowXpr result) {
00606   int i,j,k;
00607 
00608   k = 0;
00609   for(i = 0; i<4; ++i) {
00610     for(j = i; j<4; ++j) {
00611       result(k++) = v(i)*w(j) + v(j)*w(i);
00612     }
00613   }
00614 }
00615 
00618 template<int VIEWS>
00619 void MotionMatrix<VIEWS>::quadratic_prod(const Eigen::Vector3d &v,
00620                                          const Eigen::Vector3d &w,
00621                  typename Eigen::Matrix<double,2*VIEWS+1,6>::RowXpr result) {
00622   int i,j,k;
00623 
00624   k = 0;
00625   for(i = 0; i<3; ++i) {
00626     for(j = i; j<3; ++j) {
00627       result(k++) = v(i)*w(j) + v(j)*w(i);
00628     }
00629   }
00630 }
